message.body: Everything's fine. Might get a haircut today. I have two auditions for acappella groups
Yeah Songfest was on Thursday. We came in second but should've got first
Oh that's fun. Let's try to talk tomorrow or Monday.
Next reading is from Matthew, I know some of these passages by heart
You'll be able to contribute well to the discussion when the time comes. It will be interesting to compare the intellectual convo with Sunday school and
sermons. I wonder if some of the kids are reading these for the first time or if they have similar background to you.
